featured.text: How did you talk your sister ________

However, each time he lost a dove into the cold water, and—with the help of her competition, his coaches would lock him in a cage sister and two men—swam and pushed the boat for for days, feeding him only coffee and bread.
He likes to _____ and play jokes on his younger sister when their parents are not around.

definition.zh_def: 姐妹中的一員，通常指同父母或至少一位共同父母的女性。
definition.en_def: A female sibling; a girl or woman who has the same parents as another person.
definition.example: My sister and I love to play together.
